DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether high-fat meal rich palmitic acid sn-2 position decrease lipaemia men age 40-70 high optimal fast triacylglycerol concentration .
DOC.brief_title: Palmitic Acid Sn-2 Position Triacylglycerols Postprandial Lipemia
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Nonsmokers Aged 4070 year Fasting TAG concentration ≥1.5 mmol/L . Reported history CVD ( myocardial infarction , angina , venous thrombosis , stroke ) , impaired fasting glucose/uncontrolled type 2 diabetes ( fast glucose ≥ 6.1 mmol/L ) , cancer , kidney , liver bowel disease . Presence gastrointestinal disorder use drug , likely alter gastrointestinal motility nutrient absorption . History substance abuse alcoholism ( previous weekly alcohol intake > 60 units/men ) Current selfreported weekly alcohol intake exceed 28 unit Allergy intolerance component test meal Unwilling restrict consumption source fish oil length study Weight change > 3kg precede 2 month Body Mass Index < 20 > 35 kg/m2 Fasting blood cholesterol > 7.8 mmol/L Current cigarette smoker . Current use lipid lower medication
